title: Onboard a New Vendor
description: The hotel is switching to a new local bakery for its morning pastries and needs to set them up as a vendor.

tasks.description: Collect the new vendor's information, including their business license and payment details.
tasks.expected_outcome: All required vendor documentation is collected.

tasks.description: Create a new vendor profile in the accounting system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new vendor is successfully added to the system.

tasks.description: Set up a recurring purchase order for daily pastry delivery.
tasks.expected_outcome: A recurring PO is created to automate future ordering.
